pages.text: YOU'RE ALIVE!$(br)Try to keep it that way.$(br)Lets get started with the basics...$(br)$(li)Daylight lasts 15 minutes$(li)You have 6 minutes grace before temperature affects you$(br)$(br)Put your first minutes to good use.  The night is not safe and you need to work fast to establish shelter.

$(li)Find the best environment you can$(li)Source these  basic resources:$(li2)gravel and flint$(li2)sticks$(li2)grass$(li2)leaves$(li2)stone$(br)$(li)Food and water can wait until you have basic tools$(li)Avoid dangerous animals or hazards$(li)try not to fall down any holes
